name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_211Pb
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Pb" means the element "lead" and "211Pb" is the isotope "lead-211" with a half-life of 2.51e-02 days.
